title: Industrial Rev Black Country Image MCQ 1

content.description:
THE BLACK COUNTRY, ANONYMOUS ENGRAVING DEPICTING THE ENGLISH TOWN OF OLDBURY, CIRCA 1850

Historical Images Archive / Alamy Stock Photo
content.question: Which of following best explains a likely reason for the title of the image?

choices.label: The prevalence of slave labor, which was used within the factories
The soot pollution, which resulted from the coal industry in the region
The increase in the use of timber, which was transported along the canals
The construction of factory buildings, which increased throughout the town

content.answer: The soot pollution, which resulted from the coal industry in the region

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
